sn36.16:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn36.16:1.2: “katamā nu kho, ānanda, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.16:1.3: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.16:1.4: “Bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā. Sādhu, bhante, bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn36.16:1.5: “Tena hi, ānanda, suṇohi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn36.16:1.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
sn36.16:1.9: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.16:1.12: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
